meta.title: Aisyira
meta.description: Excellent freelance company from Bali, Indonesia.
meta.author: Farooq Agent

data.title: Aisyira
data.bodyCopyShort:
Lestari Diskon is a mobile platform application provides merchant information which collaborate with BPR Lestari. Lestari Diskon provides complete information about merchants covering major discounts, locations, phone numbers, and opening hours.
Through this application, user will be facilitated in finding merchants to get discounts using The Royal, Lestari First and Lestari First Ladies cards.
